    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Adjective
    The Adjective class is responsible for managing and accessing a list of adjectives loaded from a file, with support for dynamic updates to the file configuration.
    AdjectiveTest
     
    AnalyzeException
    Custom runtime exception that encapsulates errors occurring during sentence analysis.
    AnalyzeSentenceService
    Service class for analyzing sentence syntax and structure.
    APIClient<T>
    * Represents a client for handling API interactions with flexible request types, maintaining configurations, * and enabling seamless execution.
    APIClient.RequestType
     
    App
    The main application class extending the JavaFX Application, responsible for initializing and managing the application lifecycle.
    AppManager
    Acts as a Facade for the core application logic, managing sentence analysis, generation, and moderation.
    ConfigManager
    The ConfigManager class is responsible for managing configuration properties in an application.
    ConfigObserver
    The ConfigObserver interface defines the contract for observing and responding to configuration changes.
    FileManager
    Provides utility methods for working with files and managing file observers.
    FileObserver
    Observes changes in a specified file and triggers notifications for these events.
    FileObserverTest
     
    FormController
    The `FormController` class is responsible for managing the application's user interface and coordinating interactions between the backend logic and frontend components.
    FutureTenseStrategy
    The FutureTenseStrategy class is a concrete implementation of the TenseStrategy interface designed for conjugating verbs into their future tense form.
    GenerateException
    Custom runtime exception that encapsulates errors occurring during sentence generation.
    GenerateSentenceService
    Service responsible for generating sentences based on configurable strategies for structure and word selection.
    LoggerManager
    Manages the creation and provision of logger instances to ensure consistent logging functionality across the application.
    MissingApiKeyException
    Custom exception to handle a missing API key.
    ModerationSentenceService
    Service class responsible for analyzing the toxicity levels of text content and moderating it.
    NewWordStrategy
    Responsibilities: - Implements the WordSelectionStrategy interface to provide a specific mechanism for populating words in a Sentence
    Noun
    The Noun class is responsible for managing and accessing a list of nouns loaded from a file, with support for dynamic updates to the file configuration.
    NounTest
     
    OriginalWordStrategy
    Responsibilities: - Implements a word selection strategy to retain and process the original words of an input sentence
    PresentTenseStrategy
    The PresentTenseStrategy class is a concrete implementation of the TenseStrategy interface designed for conjugating verbs into their present tense form.
    RandomStructureStrategy
    Implements a strategy for generating sentences with randomly selected sentence structures.
    SameAsAnalyzedStructureStrategy
    Implements a strategy to reuse the structure of a given input sentence for sentence generation.
    SelectedStructureStrategy
    Represents a strategy that uses a preselected sentence structure for sentence generation.
    Sentence
    The Sentence class is responsible for representing and analyzing a sentence's structure, content, and attributes.
    SentenceStructure
    Manages sentence structures for generating sentences and observes configuration changes.
    SentenceStructureTest
     
    SettingsController
    Controller responsible for managing the settings interface in the application.
    StrategyType
    Represents the types of strategies available for generating or selecting sentence structures.
    StructureSentenceStrategy
    Strategy interface for generating sentence structures.
    TaskManager
    Manages the execution of asynchronous tasks with centralized lifecycle management, logging, and error handling functionality.
    TenseStrategy
    The TenseStrategy interface provides a mechanism for implementing different strategies to conjugate verbs into various tenses.
    Verb
    The Verb class is responsible for managing and accessing a list of verbs loaded from a file, with support for dynamic updates to the file configuration.
    VerbTest
     
    VocabularyController
    The VocabularyController class is responsible for managing user input related to vocabulary (verbs, nouns, adjectives) and updating the associated vocabulary files accordingly.
    Word
    The Word class is an abstract representation of a word list that is dynamically loaded from a file and observed for changes.
    WordFactory
    The WordFactory class is a factory responsible for providing instances of specific word type providers such as Noun, Adjective, or Verb.
    WordFactory.WordType
    Represents the types of words supported within the system.
    WordFactoryTest
     
    WordSelectionStrategy
    Responsibilities: - Defines a strategy for selecting and populating words into a Sentence object
    WordTest
